title: Poisoned Pet Legend
subtitle: Cat turns up dead after gobbling dinner party food; guests are rushed to hospital.?
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A cat that had helped itself to salmon mousse prepared for an upcoming dinner party later turns up dead. The hostess, fearful her dish is poisoned, convinces her guests to rush to the hospital and get their stomachs pumped. Later that evening a neighbor comes over to apologize for running over the cat.
